name: Mojo
address: 70-20 Austin St, Forest Hills, NY 11375, USA

reviews.text: Our server was great!!!

I've been here 3 times‚Äîfirst time was beginning of covid when they had their outdoor space. I enjoyed it a lot, and looked forward to returning. 2nd time was for brunch‚ÄîI can't remember what I ordered, but I do remember that it was pretty standard, and nothing really stood out. 3rd time however, I ordered 3 appetizers, and my wife and I each ordered an entree. EVERYTHING was ridiculously salty: the tostada, shrimp tacos, cevice, jumpin lomo, and ropa vieja‚Äîall over-salted. We barely touched any of the food, and notified our server that the salt content made everything inedible, but she practically shrugged her shoulders, and seemed apathetic; no recourse; no offers to replace any of the food, and even asked if we wanted to-go boxes. It's a shame because it was amazing the first time.

I absolutely love it here. Lucy is just so amazing and makes our dining experience even better. Celebrated my birthday party here and she made sure everything was running smoothly and the food never misses. Very delicious. I will be going there for more events in the future!
Daniela was an amazing host‚Ä¶ everything was quick and good. 10/10
Daniela was the absolute best!!!! Make sure to ask for her when you come! Everything was 10/10
Delaney our waitress was great. We loved our red sangrias. The chicken empanadas and the garlic shrimp were amazing.  Definitely recommend this place
Delaney was great! Great food!
Daniella was so amazing! We celebrated my daughter‚Äôs 25th birthday and everything was just perfect!
I had a great experience!
Exactamente comida un ambiente acogedor
Daniela‚Äô service  was great!!
Great food! Our server Daniela was so sweet and attentive. Will be going back
Every dish was cooked to perfection.

Delicious! 100% worth it, we were only in NY for one night and looking for something good. Value for money, great flavour, generous portions. Our server Daniela took great care of us and recommended an incredible sangria
Melissa was a great server! Food was very good!

Melissa was an amazing waitress. Very attentive, good and fast service. We were a group of 11 celebrating my brother‚Äôs confirmation and everything was great. She even offered to cut the cake for us. The food was great also, the churros for desert delicious. Thank you Mojo. Thank you Melissa. Definitely coming back üíØüíØüíØüíØ
Delaney was a great hostes!!
Daniela was awesome! She was attentive to our table. The music, vibes and food was a 10/10!!! I can‚Äôt wait to come back
Daniela really was the best ! Especially her nice Halloween costume !! 10/10
Always a vibe and good food!
Our waitress Daniela was amazing and made our Halloween dinner experience at Mojo very fun! Exceptional service, delicious food, and fun atmosphere!!
Drinks and food were great!! Thanks Andrea for taking care of us!

I went to Mojo last night. My boyfriend and I sat at the bar table and our waitress was decent at first. We ordered the salmon tartare tacos and it was okay. Nothing crazy about it.

Next, our entrees were decent, the drinks were great! The blackberry margarita was superb! A highlight of the night.

What wasn't a highlight was not having a waitress after receiving our food. She basically disappeared.  We had to grab the bartenders attention who was nice about it but it did leave us with a sour taste. When we received our bill, a $20 tip was automatically added to our bill.

Tips are based on service and shouldnt be added automatically for a party of two. For the waitress to have ghosted us, have us wait for a while for the check, to then automatically add the tip. It wasnt worth it.

If you want a great Latin Cuisine place, I suggest going elsewhere. This used to be the spot especially during covid times and a bit after but its not the same anymore.

Delaney was such a treat! She made the experience so wonderful. She was informative and friendly. If I‚Äôm ready to invite you to sit down with my party, your job was above and beyond done and she did that. The atmosphere of this place was super cute with all of the flowers. Music was great and of good volume. I had the chicken taquitos and ropa viejo and both were delicious. I recommend üëåüèæ Oh, the happy hour, on point. Very accomodating and attentive. Thanks Delaney!
Melissa was fantastic.
Had a great time here for the first time and will definitely come again. Delaney was a fantastic server. Highly recommend.
Delaney was amazing! The filet special was delicious!!!!
Loved this restaurant! The food was delicious, the service was great and they even took our picture professionally. It was awesome. Definitely will be back
Melissa did an amazing job!!!
Melissa was our server and she took great care of us
Food was good, atmosphere was chill and not too loud (despite the restaurant having sports bar vibes). Our server Melissa was fantastic. Def recommend!
Delaney is the best!! Had a great time celebrating my friend‚Äôs birthday. Great food and service. Will be back!
Delaney was soo attentive great food and drinks!
Our server Sebastian was amazing and the food was incredible ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Daniela made my 60th Birthday dinner great and served us with great service with a beautiful smile. Thank you.
Daniela is an excellent server. She was lovely and I highly recommend!
Great Food and Service!
Daniela was amazing and took care of us! She was very attentive of the table. Will def be coming back!
Daniela was great, attentive and over all exceptional the food was amazing overall everything was fantastic I just keep coming back üòã
Great food!

Delaney Our server was absolutely wonderful! They were so kind, professional, and made us feel truly welcome. Everything came out just as we ordered, and they checked on us often without being intrusive. Couldn‚Äôt have asked for better service!
Very fast service and excellent customer care! Enjoyed having Delaney as my waitress. She is truly a doll!
The food is always amazing here! Love the vibe and variation of food and drinks. Delaney our waitress was the absolutel sweetest! Highly recommend for a brunch / lunch spot!
Our server Danlela was amazing! Great food and service!

Loved the food! Our amazing server Melissa, recommended the salmon ceviche tacos and they were so flavorful‚Äî ‚Äúit was like a crunchy salmon taco‚Äù. The  drinks were also phenomenal, we got the Tata-Tinis for Breast cancer awareness month. Would definitely come back!
Daniella is my favorite ! Beautiful soul . Made sure everything was together and on time ü©∑
Daniela service and the food are amazing. I‚Äôll be back !

Matias made our experience wonderful we had stopped coming to Mojo due to bad experiences but he made us feel so welcomed and it was wonderful the old fashioned drink was excellent highly recommend!! Thanks Matias
Yeah I cut myself but the food and attention from Daniela was really good

Delaney was really nice.  She presented herself very professionally and she is very pretty. The passion fruit cheesecake they gave for my birthday was delicious!! Thanks for the experience. I‚Äôm from Chicago and I really enjoyed the service here.

Melissa made this experience absolutely amazing! She was so kind & attentive. We tried new things, were recommended items & enjoyed everything! Our drinks were never empty & our belly‚Äôs left full. Thank you so much  for this experience!

nice restaurant with great ambiance. most people were on dates so great date spot!
didn‚Äôt get any drinks but they looked delish and had great prices.
got the chicken fried rice and it was good

Mojo, a vibrant Latin American restaurant nestled in Forest Hills, NY, offers a truly captivating dining experience that transports you straight to a tropical paradise. From the moment you step inside, the ambiance is undeniably beautiful, evoking the feeling of being in a lush, exotic country, setting the perfect stage for an unforgettable meal.

The culinary journey at Mojo is nothing short of exceptional. We indulged in a variety of dishes, and each one impressed. The cocktails were a fantastic start; we ordered two, and they were not only delicious but also commendably strong, perfectly setting the mood for the evening. The appetizers were truly excellent and bursting with flavor, showcasing the kitchen's mastery of Latin American cuisine. As for the main meals, they were, quite simply, insanely good ‚Äì we were genuinely blown away by the incredible taste and authenticity.

While the experience is rich in flavor and atmosphere, it's worth noting the pricing. Expect to spend around $150 for two, which we found to be a fair price given the high quality of the dishes, the delightful drinks, and the immersive ambiance.

One practical consideration for diners is parking. It can be quite challenging to find parking directly around the restaurant. However, there are convenient paid parking options available near the nearby Target, making it manageable to access this culinary gem.

Mojo is a standout Latin American restaurant that delivers on all fronts: exquisite dishes, potent cocktails, a stunning tropical ambiance, and a fair price point for the quality offered. Despite the minor parking hurdle, it's a highly recommended destination for anyone seeking a flavorful escape in Forest Hills.

My girlfriend and I came here for brunch and we had a great time. Making a reservation online was simple, our waitress Andrea was very helpful and knowledgeable about the menu. The guacamole & chips and truffle fries were really good! Our mains were the chicken Maduro waffles and chicken Caeser salad delicious! The music was dope too. If you're looking for a cool brunch spot with food, music, and drinks are good all around, I would definitely recommend this spot.

Looking for a great meal?  Look no further. Great appetizers and entrees, fantastic service and a fun room. The music growing in volume with each song is the only thing that could change. But I'll forgo hearing my husband speak to eat here again!

My partner and I came here to celebrate and our visit was wonderful, Delaney was great and super attentive! On top of the incredible service, we had delicious food and the atmosphere was lively. I highly recommend this to anyone in the area!
Service was 10/10 tonight. Prompt seating and food service. Drinks and food were great as usual. Delaney was amazing, she answered all of our questions and made great suggestions.

Came here for bday lunch for my sister. Great brunch menu and drinks and service. I really appreciate when places don‚Äôt rush you and let you enjoy. Daniella was a great server, would 100% come backkk

Everything was spectacular! From the food to the service to the atmosphere, so so good! Our server, Delaney, was so sweet and attentive. We had a wonderful time. There are also vegan and vegetarian options!

I had such a great experience at Mojo in Forest Hills! The atmosphere was warm and inviting, and the food was delicious. A big shoutout to our server, Delaney, who made the day even better. She was friendly, attentive, and made sure everything was perfect from start to finish. Thank you, Delaney, for the wonderful service, I‚Äôll definitely be coming back!
Our server Delaney was great! The food was yummy and the environment fun! Las Flores drink was pretty and delicious. The passion fruit cheese was delishhh.

Great service and food. Was originally told a 45mims wait time but only stood around for 20mins max, which we spent at the bar grabbing a drink. Overall they had a variety of options for both vegan/ vegetarian and ofc carnivore diets. I ate the vegan ceviche and got a side order of rice, beans, and avocado. 2 drinks and the 4 leches dessert. Highly recommend

The food was mediocre and expensive. The bathrooms are disgusting. Mirror scratched up and lights are so dim to the point where you can‚Äôt even see your face. Not even exaggerating, I had to use a flashlight to see where everything was. Extremely unsanitary. The waitresses also wear extremely tiny skirts and it‚Äôs pretty unsettling. Would not recommend for groups of over 3. There‚Äôs a 20% gratuity fee for parties over 3 just to receive mediocre service and food.

Laura was a great and attentive server :) we really appreciated her service, first time at this restaurant and the food was amazing, HIGHLY recommend the passion fruit cheesecake as dessert!! Would definitely come back :)

I had the pleasure of being served by Delaney during my recent visit, and I can‚Äôt say enough good things about the experience. From the moment we were seated, they were warm, attentive, and incredibly professional. They struck the perfect balance between being friendly and efficient always nearby when we needed something, but never intrusive. What really stood out was their knowledge of the menu and their genuine enthusiasm for helping us choose the right dishes. Every recommendation was spot on, and they even accommodated a few special requests with ease and a smile. Our drinks were always full, courses were timed perfectly, and we felt well taken care of the entire evening. It‚Äôs rare to come across someone who clearly takes pride in their work and truly enhances the dining experience. Delaney is a gem, and a big reason why I‚Äôll definitely be returning. If you visit, ask for them you‚Äôll be in great hands!

First time experiencing this restaurant love the place very vibrant for date night great service everyone sees you with a smile. Food and drinks were excellent. Our server Daniella was superb very attentive very sweet made sure that everything was perfect for us would def recommend she gets a raise for her genuine hospitality and service. Overall great experience would def come back.

One of our go-to brunch spots on Austin street. Solid food and great atmosphere, drink menu is great too. The menu changes just enough to keep things interesting as well. My biggest request though: please bring back the arepas that used to be a brunch appetizer! They were fantastic üôè

Our waiter was Daniela and she was great. It was a full house today but she was always so nice and making sure we are happy with our food as well as making sure our table was clean or if we needed anything. Super happy with today. The food and desserts were verrrry good. Supper happy with everything. Thank you Daniela!

I've been enjoying this place for years! The food is so delicious. The cocktails are made well ! The staff is always accommodating and super friendly, especially Delaney! She made suggestions and was super friendly and helpful! The music was great !

Great food, drinks, and atmosphere, did not like the way steak was prepared and was able to change it for chicken but Daniela out sever was so nice and the restaurant was so accommodating, I recommend.

My experience here was pretty good as there were a few hiccups, but they rebounded from them well.  To start, we had the chips and guacamole which were pretty good.  The chips were strong and did not break when dipping them in which is a plus.  The appetizer came out quick, and the service was well paced for the most part.  Our waitress checked in with us throughout the meal to make sure everything was alright.  I ordered the burger with no ketchup cooked at medium rare, and it came out overcooked.  That said, they took it back right away and brought out another burger that was cooked to my liking.  On top of that, they also gave an additional portion of fries which I appreciated.  When they brought out the second burger, I think they forgot that I did not want the ketchup because it was on there.  I was still able to enjoy the burger as it was cooked well and the toppings (eggs caramelized onion) were able to partially distract me from the ketchup.  I was also able to try some of the fried rice that my peer ordered which was delicious; when coming back, I think I would order this because they gave a nice hearty portion as well.  I did not try any drinks, but they seemed to have a good selection.  The place was a little loud for me, but I can‚Äôt really fault them for that as there was live music being played; it was also a popular hour.  I appreciate that they made sure we had a good experience in the end.  Before we left, they offered a dessert on the house; I chose the passion fruit cheesecake and it was great.  It came with a nice side of what seemed like passion fruit jam which complimented the cake very well.  Overall, this meal satisfied me and I was happy with my experience.  The workers definitely care about the customer experience which goes a long way.

The food here was absolutely phenomenal‚Äîtruly a 10/10 experience, and I‚Äôd recommend it without hesitation. We came on a Saturday for brunch, and from the moment we walked in, the ambiance was stunning. The floral decor throughout the space, especially around the bar and upstairs, made for a beautiful setting and the perfect photo op.

Our waiter, Eric, was incredibly accommodating and friendly, adding to the overall great vibe. Now let‚Äôs talk about the food‚Äîchef‚Äôs kiss! The steak was perfectly seasoned and cooked to perfection, and the French toast was so fluffy and flavorful, it didn‚Äôt even need syrup. Topped with fresh berries, it was the star of the table. The drinks were equally impressive, and I appreciated that they offered delicious mocktail options as well.

This spot is definitely going on my list of places to return to!

Mojo restaurant will forever hold a special place in my heart. It was not only the setting for my very first date with my now-fianc√©, but also the incredible place where I planned and pulled off our engagement‚Äîflawlessly on August 23, thanks in huge part to the amazing team.

From the moment we walked in, the atmosphere was pure magic. Warm, intimate lighting, elegant decor, and a vibe that strikes the perfect balance between upscale and welcoming. The food? Absolutely phenomenal. We started with amazing appetizers and every bite was bursting with flavor. Our mains were cooked to perfection‚Äîespecially the churrasco‚Äîand the tres leche? Let‚Äôs just say, it was the cherry on top of a perfect night.

But what made the evening unforgettable was the incredible staff, especially Billy the manager. Billy went above and beyond helping me plan the proposal down to the smallest detail. From arranging the perfect table to timing everything just right‚Äîhe was an absolute legend. Thanks to his help, the surprise went off without a hitch, and it was even more beautiful than I imagined.
If you‚Äôre looking for a place that combines top-tier cuisine, exceptional service, and the kind of atmosphere that turns moments into lifelong memories‚ÄîMojo restaurant is it. Whether it's your first date or the moment you ask someone to marry you, this is the place to do it.

Thank you again, Billy and the entire team. We‚Äôll be back to celebrate many anniversaries to come!

I ordered the Mojo Burger and was really disappointed. The egg on the burger wasn‚Äôt soft at all‚Äîit was basically a hard-boiled egg, which completely threw off the taste. The burger itself had no flavor and was just bad overall. The calamari was also not good, very underwhelming. The only decent part of the meal were the fries, but fries are hard to mess up. Definitely not a place I‚Äôd come back to for a burger.

I came to Mojo for my birthday and had an amazing experience. Andrea and David were my servers. They are sweat and polite and very respectful as well as accommodating. I am in the customer service so I look out for customer service accommodations. The food was very good and fulfilling. I had the shrimp tacos with a side of yellow rice. The food was really good. The atmosphere was just as calm and welcoming and easy going. They actually give you your space and time to enjoy here at Mojo. I also found this place off til tok so this place was a great find! I definitely recommend this place and will come back here.

Listen, if your going to the forest hills location? Look for Miss Delaneyyyyyyyyy! Thee badddesssstttt. Absolutely loved the service and attentiveness! Felt very seen and taken care of! I truly appreciate her and everything she did! Top tier! 10/10! I am genuinely coming back because of her! Cause that's my new bestieeeeeeee. Thank you for everything! Food was amazing btw! Also thank you for the birthday wishes! i really did love it!

Everything in the establishment was really clean. Delaney was very nice and welcoming when it came to her service and seating me. I really loved the food, it tasted really good. I mean to me, the food was very authentic to taste.

Delaney was exceptional. The food and drinks were phenomenal but the service is what really put it over the top. I have been in the industry for 14 years and was so impressed.  She was so attentive and caring and remembered small details about our celebrations. Truly exceptional.

Melissa is the best server!! She‚Äôs very kind and accommodating. I needed to charge my phone and she‚Äôs the first to help me. Overall, good experience. I got the bistec and it was amazing!! The whole restaurant is so cute me and my friends loved the vibes

Delaney was an outstanding waiter, consistently attentive to our needs throughout the meal. She had a warm and friendly demeanor that made us feel welcomed right away. Delaney not only took the time to check in on us regularly but also ensured that our experience was enjoyable from start to finish. Her exceptional service truly elevated our dining experience.
Daniela was awesome! Her customer service was great! Wings were juicy and delicious! The passion fruit  and  mango cheesecake were excellent! Pi√±a colada was pleasantly sweet!

I had two wonderful experiences at Mojo in August 2025, and both visits were nothing short of excellent.

On Saturday, August 23rd, 2025, I stopped by to ask if I could place an order in advance. One of the hosts, Emily, kindly explained that it wasn‚Äôt possible but shared a very helpful tip: the restaurant tends to be busy on Fridays and Saturdays due to Forest Hills Stadium concert events, while Mondays through Thursdays are much less crowded. She also patiently walked me through the vegetarian and vegan options, even pointing out which vegetarian dishes could be made vegan. Her thoughtful explanation convinced me to plan my visit for a weekday instead of the weekend.

On Tuesday, August 26th, 2025, I returned and was served by Delaney, who was incredibly friendly and energetic. She even asked whether I wanted my dishes served together or separately. Since I wanted to take a photo for my Google Maps review, I asked for both dishes to be served at the same time. I ordered the black bean burger (made vegan) and the Mojo vegan ceviche, along with a side salad instead of fries. When it came time to pay, Delaney helpfully explained that the tip was already included in the payment system, ensuring full transparency. I really appreciated that level of honesty and clear communication.

As for the food‚Äîabsolutely delicious. Everything was fresh, beautifully prepared, and exactly how I requested for my vegan diet. Mojo is now my top recommendation for anyone looking for vegetarian or vegan options in a warm, welcoming environment.

If you love good food, great service, and a place that truly values its customers, Mojo is a must-visit.
Very nice. I went to meet with my best friends from childhood and each of our meals were delicious and good drinks too. Reasonably priced. We enjoyed it

Mojo and I are like this ü§ûüèº I love coming here. The atmosphere is very friendly, and the food is simply amazing! I visited on Father‚Äôs Day and was pleasantly surprised to find a reservation for the same night. This is my second time here, and it was just as I had expected. It‚Äôs a bit dark and loud, but that‚Äôs okay. They have the best burgers ever! I love the runny yolk‚Äîit‚Äôs top-tier!

First time here, came on a solo date and was seated immediately. The food was very delicious I had the chicken fried rice with some french fries. I also ordered a coco mojo which wasn‚Äôt my type of drink but then ordered the regular blue Hawaiian and loved it! The beat part was the service, Daniela was absolutely gorgeous and super sweet, very attentive and got everything right! Thank you so I will be back with the family. Oh and the music was great tonight!

Food was really delicious, the Team were helpful and welcoming but I think the drinks portion could/should have been a bit more rather having 3/4 of ice LOL even when we reorder the less ice was half glass of ice hahaha. But I guess business is business !

We had such a great time at Mojo in Forest Hills! Our waitress Andrea was amazing. She was so attentive with our food and drink orders and even gave our drinks a little extra kick when we asked üòâ The Latin food was delicious, portions were generous, and everything came out perfect.

On top of that, the photographer, Saul, did an amazing job capturing the moment, and made the night feel even more special.

Great food, fun vibes, and excellent service. We‚Äôll definitely be back!

It‚Äôs a lovely experience! Went here with some close friends of mine and the expectations were good but I had a great churro pancake! Kianna in particular was incredible lovely and helpful in explaining the menu items to us!

We celebrated a special occasion at Mojo Restaurant and Delaney went above and beyond to make it unforgettable. Her warm smile and attentive service made us feel at home. Thank you, Delaney, for your exceptional hospitality ‚Äì we can't wait to come back!

We had the best time celebrating a family birthday at Mojo's Sunday Brunch! We were a large party of 12, including four kids, and the staff was so accommodating. They seated us quickly in a spacious area and were super patient with all our requests. The Latin fusion menu is fantastic‚Äîthe adults loved the specialty tacos and frozen drinks, and the kids devoured the empanadas and the delicious churros for dessert. The atmosphere is lively and buzzing, which made us feel comfortable with the little ones making a bit of noise. It truly was a seamless, fun, and flavorful brunch experience. Highly recommend Mojo

I had an amazing experience at Mojo. Andrea was such a friendly and attentive server, she made sure everything was perfect from start to finish. I ordered the salmon, and it was absolutely outstanding perfectly cooked, crispy and full of flavor. Highly recommend both the dish and Andrea‚Äôs excellent service!
Our server was Delaney she was amazing !!! Great food and great service ! Will definitely return when back in the area!!

Daniela was our server today. We went for a birthday brunch. She was very nice, friendly and patient. Food was just okay. Drinks were great and the atmosphere was fun. Music was good but just a bit too loud. It would have gotten more stars if the food was better.

I love the atmosphere. We were seated as soon as we got here.
My boyfriend and I got the beef empanadas(so crispy), and the churrasco and it was delicious !
Their drinks (pi√±a colada and pink flamingo) were amazing.
Thanks to our server Eric, he made this a pleasant experience. üíï

It was my first time at Mojo and I had a great time with friends! Melissa was our server and she was super nice and helpful with any questions we had. Would recommend and come back to try more dishes!

I had a great experience at mojo! I got the chimichurri chicken which was very flavorful. My server, Delaney, was friendly, kind and provided exceptional customer service. She answered all of my questions and did not make me feel rushed. I would definitely recommend!

We had a fantastic brunch at Mojos this Sunday, arriving bright and early at 11am and having the place to ourselves! Our waitress, Daniela, was exceptional ‚Äì truly attentive and went above and beyond to ensure we had a wonderful time. We started with the highly-rated Calamari, which lived up to the hype. For our mains, we enjoyed the Chicken Maduro Waffles, the Poblano Chicken Sandwich, and the standout Mojo Burger. The Mojo Burger was incredibly satisfying, packed with protein and served with a generous portion of fries. Adding a dash of hot sauce elevated it even further. I highly recommend Mojos, especially with Daniela's excellent service, and will definitely be bringing friends and family back!
